message: Let's start fair. I get 90% and you get 10%. This way, we can both be happy.
I understand you want a larger share, but my turn now. Let's be reasonable. This offer ensures you get a good deal before inflation impacts us further.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 60/40. I'm feeling generous, but this is my best offer.  Don't let inflation hurt us both.
